Stupid game, not friendly for beginners or for solo-gamers at all. When you play competitive matches and you will most likely or 9/10 times end up with 4 stupid Russians who will attack you as a teammate for no reason then they will kick you out of the game. After you get kicked out then you will receive ban from playing competitive. The whole system is total rubbish. I would rather play f-king candy crush over this a*s game
